product_name: Mountain Hardwear Yuma II Convertible Pants - Women's Short
long_description: The women's short-length Mountain Hardwear Yuma Convertible Pants are a popular choice for hiking. They offer durability, stretch and have a waist that's designed for comfort when wearing a pack. Legs zip off to create capri-length pants with 17 in. inseam. Lightweight nylon is blended with elastane for ample 4-way stretch so pants won't bind or catch; full-length inseam gusset ensures easy mobility. Mountain Hardwear Yuma Convertible Pants are treated with a durable water repellent finish to shed dirt and water. UPF 50+ sun protection. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined seamless conical waist provides comfort under a pack; soft drawcord at waist creates easy fit adjustments. Drawcords at ankles cinch cuffs against boots to keep out trail grit; loosen them up for casual occasions. Zip-secure, cargo pocket offers convenient storage.
